com.mb3364.twitch.api.auth

Class Authenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mb3364.twitch.api.auth.Authenticator

  • public class Authenticator
extends java.lang.Object
    The authenticator object allows a user to authenticate with the Twitch.tv servers.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

        public Authenticator(java.lang.String twitchBaseUrl)

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticationUrl

        public java.lang.String getAuthenticationUrl(java.lang.String clientId,
                                             java.net.URI redirectURI,
                                             Scopes... scopes)
        Returns the authentication URL that you can redirect the user to in order to authorize your application to access their account and retrieve an access token.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the Twitch application client ID
        redirectURI - the redirect URI for your Twitch application
        scopes - the scopes needed for your application
        Returns:
        String, the authentication URL

      • awaitAccessToken

        public boolean awaitAccessToken()
        Listens for callback from twitch server with the access token. getAuthenticationUrl() must be called prior to this function!
        Returns:
        true if access token was received, false otherwise

      • getClientId

        public java.lang.String getClientId()

      • getRedirectUri

        public java.net.URI getRedirectUri()

      • getAccessToken

        public java.lang.String getAccessToken()

      • setAccessToken

        public void setAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken)

      • hasAccessToken

        public boolean hasAccessToken()
        Check if an access token has been received.
        Returns:
        true if an access token has been received; false otherwise

      • getAuthenticationError

        public AuthenticationError getAuthenticationError()
        Get the authentication error if it failed.
        Returns:
        AuthenticationError if authentication failed. null otherwise

      • hasAuthenticationError

        public boolean hasAuthenticationError()
        Check if there was an authentication error.
        Returns:
        true if an error exists; false otherwise
